It\'s time to take your tests.
1. Voice test. Find a quiet location. When you are ready, press the button below.
2. Balance test. Now find a place where you can stand unaided.
3. Gait test. Now find a place where you can walk for 20 yards unobstructed.
4. Dexterity test. When you are ready, press the button below.
5. Reaction test. When you are ready, press the button below.
6. Rest tremor test. Sit upright, hold the phone in your hand most affected by your tremor and rest it lightly in your lap. When you are ready, press the "Start test" button.
7. Postural tremor test. Sit upright and hold the phone in the hand which is most affect by tremor, arm outstretched in front of you. Press Start.
Tests successfully completed! Please press the button below to exit.
1. Voice test. Hold the phone to your ear. Take a deep breath, and say \'aaaaah\' at a comfortable and steady, tone and level, for as long as you can.
2. Balance test. Stand up straight, and place the phone in your pocket. When the buzzer vibrates, stay standing until the buzzer vibrates again.
3. Gait test. Stand up, and place the phone in your pocket. When the buzzer vibrates, walk forward 20 yards. Then stop, turn around, and walk back again.
4. Dexterity test. Tap the buttons below with the index and middle fingers of one hand alternately, in a regular rhythm.
5. Reaction test. Press the button below as soon as it appears; release as soon as it disappears.
6. Rest tremor test. Close your eyes and count backwards from 100 while you continue to hold the phone.
7. Postural tremor test. Keep your arm holding the phone outstretched in front of you.
